title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw
name: neotw
author: oeyoews
text:
{"tiddlers":{"neotw/repo-button":{"title":"neotw/repo-button","caption":"repo button","description":"repo button","tags":"$:/tags/PageControls","text":"\whitespace trim \define base-repo() https://gitlab.com/ \define target() oeyoews/neotw <$button tooltip="Repo" aria-label="GRB" class=<>> addprefix]}}} target="_blank"> {{$:/images/gitlab}} "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/icon","text":"{{$:/favicon.ico}} "},"Index":{"title":"Index","text":"
Hello, on <>
{{neotw/image/showcase-01.png}} {{neotw/badges}} {{$:/state/git/commit}} "},"neotw/library":{"title":"neotw/library","description":"neotw library","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Neotw Plugin Library","url":"https://neotw.netlify.app/library/index.html","text":"Neotw Plugin Library "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define neotw-username(username:"oeyoews") $username$ \end \define neotw-align(align:"center", tiddler)
{{$tiddler$}}
\end \define details(text:"", summary:"details" open:"")
$summary$ $text$
\end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/pluginlist":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/pluginlist","text":"<$vars qualified-state=<> pluginFilter="[plugin-type[plugin]prefix[$:/plugins/oeyoews/]] +[!has[draft.of]sort[]search:-text,*]" > <$list filter=<> emptyMessage=<> template="$:/core/ui/Components/plugin-info"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/readme","text":"* neotw builtin plugin "},"$:/config/AnimationDuration":{"title":"$:/config/AnimationDuration","text":"350 "},"$:/config/NewJournal/Title":{"title":"$:/config/NewJournal/Title","text":"YYYY/0MM/0DD "},"$:/DefaultTiddlers":{"title":"$:/DefaultTiddlers","text":"Index [list[$:/StoryList]] "},"$:/SiteSubtitle":{"title":"$:/SiteSubtitle","text":"A modern notebook based on TiddlyWiki5 "},"neotw/copy-text":{"title":"neotw/copy-text","caption":"copy code","description":"copy text","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","text":"\whitespace trim <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param={{!!text}} tooltip="copy current code" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{neotw/svg/vscode}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> "},"neotw/viewbar/copy-title":{"title":"neotw/viewbar/copy-title","caption":"Copy Tiddler Title","description":"Copy the name of this tiddler to the clipboard","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\whitespace trim <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param={{!!title}} tooltip="copy current title" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/copy-clipboard}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> "}}}
